title: Combat Acne with Ayurvedic Actives
author: Harish
excerpt: Tea tree, neem, and aloe offer powerful yet gentle ways to manage acne. Learn how to use them effectively and what results to expect.
content:
Understanding Acne in Ayurveda

Acne is often linked to Pitta imbalance—excess heat, inflammation, and bacterial activity in the skin. Herbs that cool, purify, and soothe offer effective, natural support.

The Ayurvedic Power Trio

  • Tea Tree: Antimicrobial and clarifying.
  • Neem: Purifies and cools irritated areas.
  • Aloe Vera: Soothes inflammation and promotes healing.

How to Use Acne Serum

  1. Cleanse face with a mild herbal cleanser.
  2. Apply 1–2 drops only on active breakouts.
  3. Follow with a lightweight moisturizer.
  4. Avoid using multiple strong actives at once.

Realistic Expectations

Natural acne care works gradually. Expect calmer, less inflamed skin in 1–2 weeks of consistent use. Persistent, cystic acne requires dermatologist evaluation.
